root:
Arcanist An older gentleman of distinguished learning, the Arcanist has lost much of his strength. His robes weigh and protect little, and his library contains knowledge of mysterious forces.
The Arcanist calls upon unseen forces to create change in the world. With sufficient mastery, he can favorably distort time for his allies, immobilize enemies in ice, and summon fire to damage and disorient them.
The Arcanist is a welcome addition to any campfire when he conjures free food. He can enchant allies, and use the fire to amplify his spellpower.
We're prepared. We're prepared.
When hit: This man is a fraud! Have you HEARD his lectures!? Share my research with this charlatan? Hmph! I don't collaborate with lesser academics. Cure {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} Elemental Arcane Arcane Elemental Clear {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end} Time Warp Dragon's Breath Frost Nova Farmstead Courtyard Using a spell breaks stealth. Offensive spells gain 20 percent extra damage. 5 percent chance for another turn. Frost Nova immobilizes enemies. They can still use movement attacks, but they can't change position. Cure {colour_start|debuff}Debuffs{colour_end} 10 percent chance for another turn. 15 percent chance for another turn. 20 percent chance for another turn. 25 percent chance for another turn. Attempt to conjure 8 provisions. Attempt to travel back in time to restore a better, previous state. Free Action 27.5 stun chance outside the Courtyard. 27.5 more outside farm. 30 stun chance outside the Courtyard. 30 more outside farm. 32.5 stun chance outside the Courtyard. 32.5 when outside farm. 35 stun chance outside the Courtyard. 35 when outside farm. Be warned: there will be severe consequences when tampering with time.
Frostfire Bolt Dragon's Breath Frost Nova Decurse Time Warp Invisibility Arcane Knowledge Blink Frostfire Bolt Dragon's Breath Frost Nova Decurse Time Warp Invisibility Arcane Knowledge
"Beyond Percepton" Vol. 1 "Infrastructure of Time and Space" Vol. 4 "Elemental Forces & How They Shift" Vol. 2 "How to Surf Waves in Spacetime" Vol. 3 "Theorem of Singularity" Arcanist's Library Novice's Robes Apprentice's Robes Journeyman's Robes Master's Robes "Fabric of Time" Arcanist's Apparel
Others:
One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Presence of Mind Combustion Arcane Intellect Conjure Food
On attack hit and miss: Friendly skills: Causes minor damage
Crystal Ice Shard Black Ice Shard Eternal Candle Cauterizing Frostflame Frozen Robes "Could I go back? Could I save you?" Frozen Skull Enchanted Compass Ring of the Red Dragon Dark Shard of Ice Unstable Artifact Time Lord's Pocket Watch Spellbook: Ice Barrier "For all my knowledge, I could not stall your death. Forgive me all you endured." Offensive Skill
I did this daily in the arena. I have plenty of mana, but I'm no healer! These are special Runecloth Bandages.
With a little knowledge, you'll go a long way. It could be worse. You could be stuck in a library all day. Everything has a cause.
In my research, life isn't so distinguishable from death. There is no death. Arguably, there never was life. Everything we experience is an illusion, my friend. Don't worry.
Plurality is an illusion of spacetime. Everything, from people to the rocks, is one thing. Martyrdom is the only way a man can become famous without ability. Remember: Once you're over the hill, you begin to gain speed.
Give me one spark, and I'll give you an explosion. We can harness volatility. Once we reach critical mass, victory is assured.
With my tutelage, you could be a great wizard. You have potential. You just need a guide. *Drops a pile of books.* Get started on these.
That'll be 2 gold and 40 silver. *He snaps his fingers* I can't alter reality, but I can conjure croissants. Decades of studying magic result in... the finest baked goods!
...
Important research-- surely, you understand!
By fire be purged! Pierce the Veil of Maya! You should read more. I've learned a few tricks in my time. The arena was a bloody place. I don't miss it. Chill. Now-- let this old man read in peace.
A robed academic approaches you. He offers to assist your endeavors in exchange for permission to study any uncovered artifacts. A Sole Researcher
I shouldn't be here!
The world-- it folds on itself in meaningless madness!
Life without pain has no meaning.
Intellect is invisible to those who have none!
Bring me a chair and a good book!
We will never transcend this fleshy form...
I see the truth of it all. Nothingness.
We won't buckle. Not here.
The elements are against them!
I will die a bed of MY choosing.
My colleagues summoned a phoenix. Me? A dragon.
A lifetime of study and practie has lead me here.
The flame in my heart burns forever!
Cleansing waters-- wash over me.
The flame guides us. We've all the torchlight we need. Let's send these fools back to my lab in pieces!
Arcane insight!
Remember: they are lesser-willed creatures. Slay these inferior cretins! Better times will come. I generally don't know healing spells, but... I should be in my library! My love, I'm not ready! No, not me! I must finish my work! Sweetheart, I'll bring you back! I must survive to finish my plans! Life is suffering. I... am ready to meet you, sweetheart. Hit me. I can barely remember her, anyway. Charlatans. All of you. Idiots! Idiots masquerading as mercenaries. Only dense fools would buy your b-- do you even HAVE books!? Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! I demand the finest quinoa. My research is fruitless... I will never save her. My mistakes are many. Time? Time! An illusion! You don't exist. We don't exist. Can we rewind time if it doesn't exist? I... am unprepared! No! Not now! I'm not ready! You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! They're quick-- guard me! Life. is. suffering. Who could say any of this is real? How I have MISSED arenas! "Space" is an illusion. There is no "forward." Forward!? Or Backward!? Who knows!? Direction is irrelevant when you realize space doesn't exist. "Space" is an illusion. There is no "backward." Backward!? Forward!? Who knows!? Direction is irrelevant when you realize space doesn't exist. I'll see you soon, sweetheart. I'll join her in death, not life. I won't see her again, anyway. Is it possible to bring her back? I tried to preserve her until a cure could be found. I... don't know how much time I have left. I'll study their flesh! FETCH MY SCALPEL! It's time to learn biology. I can fight them all, why should this stop me? Hmph. No artifact, no arcanist. I'd rather return to the Hamlet. I belong in my tower. No, that'll get me killed! Why!? No! I must escape! But I'll die! I refuse. It's a bad idea. Not for me! I'm truly alone. I'd rather find a better team. Let me die and meet her. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! You and I are the same, and we both say "No." Out of mana! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Behold true power, you rapscallions! Sit down and learn from Daddy Wizard. GET THEM! You're as fake as Houdini. I doubt you could graduate from a trash can. Hmph. I don't heed orders from rubbish commanders. Selfish? Or simply more intelligent? You're worth nothing to me. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me bring her back. I'm done here. The void calls. I heard someone. Was it you or me? Trick question! I'd rather not. ... I just want to return. We're surrounded out here. ... will I ever return to my tower? The Will of life, it flickers! *Rubs his head* If my magic fails, we could be stuck in a loop here. We could relive this hell if we don't leave! If I cast more spells, it might warp our fates irreparably. More. My body is ready for its final rest. I will see her again. Why should I share my croissants with you? All your brain matter combined couldn't rival a rat's. Put yourselves in my shoes: you're alone with idiots. What hope do you have? Get back from my croissants! *He gestures for his party members to get back.* Put yourselves in my shoes: you're alone with idiots. We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. Life and death are waves lapping upon the sea of Will. Death is an illusion, just as the curvatures and colors in our perception. I pierced the Veil of Maya once. I saw nothingness. Life and death are waves lapping upon the sea of Will. Duel me! Let this Arcanist's tale come to an end. I'm ready to see her. Nothing remains once you strip us down to our Will. I forgot my Ice Block spell. Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of your foolishness! You're not only dead weight, but stupid weight. Time yields for no fool! If you don't die to time, you'll die to foolishness! Woops. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with her. I'm ready. The pain-- there's a truth to it. Nonsense becomes us! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to my publishers. I'm here for a reason. Trust in this wizard. We need to end this battle. Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Look. The worm writhes. Mediocre, which is good for a charlatan. Why would you hit yourself? Ouch. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! SOMEONE, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! LEARN TO ATTACK, YOU SCRUB! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck alone. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Life is suffering. Mm. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Good technique if you're counting by degrees of idiocy. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. You don't tell me what to do. Talk to my publisher, first. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!

Life without pain has no meaning.
Intellect is invisible to those who have none!
Bring me a chair and a good book!
We will never transcend this fleshy form...
I see the truth of it all. Nothingness.
We won't buckle. Not here.
The elements are against them!
I will die a bed of MY choosing.
My colleagues summoned a phoenix. Me? A dragon.
A lifetime of study and practie has lead me here.
The flame in my heart burns forever!
Cleansing waters-- wash over me.
The flame guides us. We've all the torchlight we need. Let's send these fools back to my lab in pieces!
Arcane insight!
Remember: they are lesser-willed creatures. Slay these inferior cretins! Better times will come. I generally don't know healing spells, but... I should be in my library! My love, I'm not ready! No, not me! I must finish my work! Sweetheart, I'll bring you back! I must survive to finish my plans! Life is suffering. I... am ready to meet you, sweetheart. Hit me. I can barely remember her, anyway. Charlatans. All of you. Idiots! Idiots masquerading as mercenaries. Only dense fools would buy your b-- do you even HAVE books!? Where's my potion!? Arcanist An older gentleman of distinguished learning, the Arcanist has lost much of his strength. His robes weigh and protect little, and his library contains knowledge of mysterious forces.
Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph! Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph!
The Arcanist calls upon unseen forces to create change in the world. With sufficient mastery, he can favorably distort time for his allies, immobilize enemies in ice, and summon fire to damage and disorient them.
The Arcanist is a welcome addition to any campfire when he conjures free food. He can enchant allies, giving them night vision, and use the fire to amplify his spellpower.
We're prepared. We're prepared.

Arcanist An older gentleman of distinguished learning, the Arcanist has lost much of his strength. His robes weigh and protect little, and his library contains knowledge of mysterious forces.
Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph! Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph!
The Arcanist calls upon unseen forces to create change in the world. With sufficient mastery, he can favorably distort time for his allies, immobilize enemies in ice, and summon fire to damage and disorient them.
The Arcanist is a welcome addition to any campfire when he conjures free food. He can enchant allies, giving them night vision, and use the fire to amplify his spellpower.
We're prepared. We're prepared.

Arcanist An older gentleman of distinguished learning, the Arcanist has lost much of his strength. His robes weigh and protect little, and his library contains knowledge of mysterious forces.
Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph! Share my research with THIS charlatan? Hmph!
The Arcanist calls upon unseen forces to create change in the world. With sufficient mastery, he can favorably distort time for his allies, immobilize enemies in ice, and summon fire to damage and disorient them.
The Arcanist is a welcome addition to any campfire when he conjures free food. He can enchant allies, giving them night vision, and use the fire to amplify his spellpower.
We're prepared. We're prepared.
